forum.name: Reflecting on Session 5.3
forum.intro:
In Session 5.3, you worked with diagrams and definitions, specifically considering how we might communicate about the features of diagrams and what constitutes a sufficient definition of different types of quadrilaterals. These experiences help us understand not only the importance of precision when we’re studying geometry, but might also illuminate some challenges students might have. Understanding what information diagrams and definitions convey is important as adult learners solve measurement problems, as well as when they are asked to construct either a formal or informal proof.

  • Reflect on Session 5.3 and share your thoughts in the discussion forum below. Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to add a post to the forum. Respond to the following:
    • What are 1–2 things you are taking away from the Session 5.3 activities that will impact activities you plan and teach to adult learners?
    • How was it helpful for you to communicate about and listen to others communicate about diagrams and definitions?
  • Read and respond to the postings of at least two other participants. (Click “Discuss this topic” on an individual post, then click “Reply” to respond to that post.)
